Helge Albin's refined compositions and superb orchestration with ever new directions and unconventional musical solutions, apparently written and performed effortlessly - creating a special atmosphere and energetic music. Tolvan Big Band is a vibrant source of energy with a whole bunch of great soloists in the band. (kopasetic.se)
